transArray.content: The floor drain in the room had a serious odor, which gave Xun a headache at night. I hope the hotel can improve and the breakfast is good!

Dear, thank you for your valuable suggestions. Regarding the floor drain odor issues you raised, we have asked our engineers to investigate and solve them one by one. We also thank you for your recognition of our breakfast. We sincerely look forward to your visit again. Wish you the best. All the best to you and your family.
